page.title: 10Clubs and Societies
page.content: There are several clubs and societies in the area.They include,Beavers, Guides and Scouts who all meet in the scout hut on Church Lane.There are also these for adults: Women's Institute,Toddler Group, Playgroup, National Housewives Register, Langley Methodist Fellowship, Hob Nob,Sunday School and Youth Club.There are others which together with these are attended and run by local people. The Rossendale trust is a unique organisation.It is based at Rossendale Hall and is a short term centre for mentally handicapped people.It was started by Messrs Hyde and Chapman both local men, who with their families and local support which has now spread much wider,established the Trust.Many local people help there on a voluntary basis.
